Is the Verus community only active on Twitter and Discord?

No, the Verus community is active on multiple platforms. According to the text, you can also find the community on Facebook, YouTube, Medium, Reddit, BitcoinTalk, Community Telegram, and has separate Twitter accounts for Community, VerusID, and VerusPay.

Download the wallet now to try fractional reserve currencies on testnet. See the developments for yourself! If you need help or have questions, don’t hesitate to ask on Discord.
